you use that chair...?\""},{"lineNumber":46109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「責任感の強い方ですから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She is a very responsible I'm glad you're safe.\""},{"lineNumber":46116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、おう。……少し落ち着いたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. ...Are you feeling a bit calmer?\""},{"lineNumber":46117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……出る前は、ごめんね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... Sorry for before I left."},{"lineNumber":46118,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう大丈夫だから」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm fine now.\""},{"lineNumber":46119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……さっき、ザカリテっていう悪魔が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... earlier, I saw what looked like a demon called Zakalite"},{"lineNumber":46120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍を倒したっぽい場を見たんですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"defeating the Monster General...\""},{"lineNumber":46121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":46122,"originalJapaneseLine":"「単刀直入に聞きますが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll ask directly,"},{"lineNumber":46123,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ザカリテを使用したのですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"did you use Zakalite?"},{"lineNumber":46124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か、異常などは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Anything unusual...?\""},{"lineNumber":46125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ええ、大丈夫よ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes, I'm fine."},{"lineNumber":46126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それより魔物将軍、ちゃんと倒せたみたいね。","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, it seems I was able to properly defeat the Monster General."},{"lineNumber":46127,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……よかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"...That's a relief.\""},{"lineNumber":46128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうかそうか。アレはお前がやったのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, I see. So that was you."},{"lineNumber":46129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　楽ちんだったぞ。よくやった」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was easy. Good job.\""},{"lineNumber":46130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、ランスばかりに危険な事はさせられないわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, I can't let only Rance do dangerous things."},{"lineNumber":46131,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスは私が守るんだもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm the one who protects Zeth, after all.\""},{"lineNumber":46132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、王っぽい事を。……ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, that's very king-like. ...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":46133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうかした、ランス？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's wrong, Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":46134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前……その頭の上に浮かんでる数字……何だ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You... what's that number floating above your head?\""},{"lineNumber":46135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":46136,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは言われて気づいた風で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic seemed to suddenly notice when told,"},{"lineNumber":46137,"originalJapaneseLine":"一瞬表情を変えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and her expression changed for a moment."},{"lineNumber":46138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あ、なんでもないわ。気にしないで。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah, it's nothing. Don't worry about it."},{"lineNumber":46139,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それより、今日はもうどこかに行かないでしょ？","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, you're not going anywhere else today, right?"},{"lineNumber":46140,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゆっくり休んで」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just rest well.\""},{"lineNumber":46141,"originalJapaneseLine":"明るくそう笑って、","translatedEnglishLine":"She smiled brightly like that,"},{"lineNumber":46142,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは司令部の残務処理に掛かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Magic got to work finishing up the remaining tasks at headquarters."},{"lineNumber":46143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":46144,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ま、一休みするか。今日は働きすぎた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well, let's take a break. I worked too much today.\""},{"lineNumber":46145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「珍しいな。お前から誘うなんて。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's rare. You inviting me."},{"lineNumber":46146,"originalJapaneseLine":"　初めてじゃないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't this the first time?\""},{"lineNumber":46147,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、誘う、って……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-invite you... well..."},{"lineNumber":46148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その、ずっとバタバタしてたりして、","translatedEnglishLine":"I've just been busy and hectic,"},{"lineNumber":46149,"originalJapaneseLine":"　落ち着いて……話す暇が、なかったし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and hadn't had time to settle down and talk...\""},{"lineNumber":46150,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜。","translatedEnglishLine":"Night."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かりました。ありがとうございます」
「じゃね。ビスケッタさんに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See you. I've been asked by Biscetta-san

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夕食の仕込みの手伝い、頼まれてるから」
「意外と呑気しとるな、あいつ……」
「ランス。ゼス王家には、契約の椅子という
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance. The Zeth royal family has a magic item called the Contract Chair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックアイテムがあります。
悪魔を収め、使役する椅子とのことです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is said to contain and command demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザカリテとかいうのが、それに入ってるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that thing called Zakalite inside it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「恐らくは。
バランスブレイカーではありませんが、
かなり特殊なアイテムです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it's quite a special item."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そんなの、いいんですか？
AL教がほっといて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The AL Church is letting it be..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何代か前の法王の記録で、特例で許すと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to the records of several Popes ago, it was exceptionally permitted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かあったのでしょうが、詳しくは分かりません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something must have happened, but the details are unknown."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジックさん、
その椅子を使ったんでしょうか……」
「責任感の強い方ですから……」
「ま、大丈夫だろ。
俺もフェリスと契約してるが、実に便利だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm also contracted with Felis, and it's really convenient."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あれは契約したというんでしょうか……」
「あれ？　ランス……」
「お、マジック」
「お疲れ様。無事で良かったわ」
「ん、おう。……少し落ち着いたか？」
「ああ……出る前は、ごめんね。
もう大丈夫だから」
「あの……さっき、ザカリテっていう悪魔が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... earlier, I saw what looked like a demon called Zakalite

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を倒したっぽい場を見たんですが……」
「単刀直入に聞きますが、
ザカリテを使用したのですか？
何か、異常などは……」
「……ええ、大丈夫よ。
それより魔物将軍、ちゃんと倒せたみたいね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, it seems I was able to properly defeat the Monster General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……よかった」
「そうかそうか。アレはお前がやったのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, I see. So that was you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽ちんだったぞ。よくやった」
「ふふ、ランスばかりに危険な事はさせられないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, I can't let only Rance do dangerous things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは私が守るんだもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm the one who protects Zeth, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、王っぽい事を。……ん？」
「どうかした、ランス？」
「お前……その頭の上に浮かんでる数字……何だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You... what's that number floating above your head?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは言われて気づいた風で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic seemed to suddenly notice when told,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬表情を変えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and her expression changed for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あ、なんでもないわ。気にしないで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、今日はもうどこかに行かないでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, you're not going anywhere else today, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆっくり休んで」
明るくそう笑って、
マジックは司令部の残務処理に掛かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Magic got to work finishing up the remaining tasks at headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様……」
「……ま、一休みするか。今日は働きすぎた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, let's take a break. I worked too much today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「珍しいな。お前から誘うなんて。
初めてじゃないのか？」
「さ、誘う、って……
その、ずっとバタバタしてたりして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've just been busy and hectic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ち着いて……話す暇が、なかったし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and hadn't had time to settle down and talk..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、今日はもうどこかに行かないでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, you're not going anywhere else today, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆっくり休んで」
明るくそう笑って、
マジックは司令部の残務処理に掛かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Magic got to work finishing up the remaining tasks at headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様……」
「……ま、一休みするか。今日は働きすぎた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, let's take a break. I worked too much today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「珍しいな。お前から誘うなんて。
初めてじゃないのか？」
「さ、誘う、って……
その、ずっとバタバタしてたりして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've just been busy and hectic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ち着いて……話す暇が、なかったし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and hadn't had time to settle down and talk..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜。
